Message:
In the end,
the Witch of Murder
used her power for me.

Even if a power is cursed,
there’s no doubt that at its core
is a human who loves others.

That’s what she meant
when she said she could
“die as a human.”

I gently stroked the flower
she left behind.
With this, I’ll be able to die too...

But, now’s not
the time to do so.

That’ll be the
“proof of my humanity.”

I sewed the flower
near my heart,
and started walking.

I’ll die as a human.
Until then, I’ll live on.

To provide me
the only way I can die.
Not as a monster,
but as a normal girl.
